comment: Welcome To Gab For help with the basics - This is a free speech platform, so be aware you may not be comfortable with everything you see, but the choice on if you want to engage within the public square is up to you because Gab is where YOU control what is censored. So mute anyone you don't want to see, those you think are trolls/spammers, or anyone that you get "triggered" by. Believe me that you will encounter a few in your Gab travels There are ways to do it: Either click on the dots at the top right of the post, and then click "Mute user" from the drop down list, or go here, where you can also manage your muteds.. Here is the main Gabteam to follow if you would like to follow updates - Andrew Torba (CEO and founder of Gab) - Ekrem Bykkaya (Head Software Engineer at Gab) These people are VERY busy so don't expect an answer from them directly, although Andrew sometimes will engage users here time permitting. I think a must to follow is Gab Support. You might also Introduce Yourself Accounts some new users look for InfoWars - His Live /7 Stream can also be accessed via the Videos Tab Paul Joseph Watson - James O'Keefe - Pat Condell - Cyprian Nyakundi - Nicholas N. Oseko - Stefan Molyneux - Tommy Robinson - Imam Tawhidi - Patrick little - (Controversial US Senate Candidate in California.) David DuByne - Black Pigeon Speaks - Styxhexenhammer666 - Jeremy - Mark Dice - Wife With A Purpose - BillMitchell - Thomas Wictor - Dr. Steve Turley - -Talks Dave Cullen - Bill Warner - The Daily Stir - Ben Garrison Cartoons - Stephen Zimmer - BitChute - Flvio Bolsonaro - The song dedicated to Gab by the Mamas the Pepes. Gab for Android: (Creator) (amq gets busy, so you may want to add him, but please try not disturb him.) (Location for the APK) (Group) For Assistance try (Group) Gab Tutorials and Update Notices If you have any questions then just ask any or all of the volunteer welcome committee: A shout out to some of the Gab accounts Some twitter account feeds are also echoed onto Gab. An example is echoed to You can also post from Gab and have it echo to Twitter Some Hashtags in use can be found at

# ::snt Welcome To Gab For help with the basics - This is a free speech platform, so be aware you may not be comfortable with everything you see, but the choice on if you want to engage within the public square is up to you because Gab is where YOU control what is censored. So mute anyone you don't want to see, those you think are trolls/spammers, or anyone that you get "triggered" by. Believe me that you will encounter a few in your Gab travels There are ways to do it: Either click on the dots at the top right of the post, and then click "Mute user" from the drop down list, or go here, where you can also manage your muteds.. Here is the main Gabteam to follow if you would like to follow updates - Andrew Torba (CEO and founder of Gab) - Ekrem Bykkaya (Head Software Engineer at Gab) These people are VERY busy so don't expect an answer from them directly, although Andrew sometimes will engage users here time permitting.
